Metacritic Quick Search Extension

Easily search for your favorite games, movies, TV shows, or music on Metacritic directly from your browser! With the Metacritic Quick Search extension, simply click on the icon, enter your search terms (even multiple ones, one per line), and get instant results powered by Google. Whether you're looking for reviews, ratings, or just general information, this tool makes your Metacritic search experience seamless and efficient. Perfect for entertainment enthusiasts and critics alike!
